summary: Adds an armory, a crafting area (forge, workbench, tanning rack, grindstone), a room for your housecarl, many containers and much more to the player home in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][size=5]BETA VERSION INFO[/size]
This is mod is currently an open beta. Please report any bugs or inconveniences you may stumble upon, do not overwrite any existing savegame while using the beta.

[b]Bugs[/b]
[list]
[*]Using a savegame with Proudspire Manor already purchased and visited before installing this mod will cause a lot of clutter (food, dishes, ingredients) to be placed wrong and/or lay on the floor. I\'m currently working on fixing this problem (as soon as I\'m familar with Papyrus).
[/color][/list]

	
[size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size]
Several parts of Proudspire Manor, the purchasable player home in Solitude, are mediocre in vanilla Skyrim.
This mod \"fixes\" this by adding/changing the following things:
[list]
[b]Basement[/b]
[*]Replaced the guest bedroom with an armory with mannequins, weapon and shield racks, many chests, training targets
[*]Combined the enchanting area with the alchemy lab, added containers for ingredients and soul gems
[*]Added a crafting area with forge, tanning rack, workbench, grindstone, weapon racks and containers for crafting materials
[*]Replaced the storage alcove with a small room for the housecarl, moved the storage crates to various locations in the basement

[b]Ground floor[/b]
[*]Darkend the way too bright lighting
[*]Moved the wall with the bench to bound the kitchen
[*]Added some containers to store food in the kitchen

[b]Upper floor[/b]
[*]Replaced the dining area with a desk, bookshelves, a map of skyrim and a small dining table
[*]Moved the safe to the living room and therefor placed a mannequin
[*]Added a wardrobe and a strongbox to store your clothing and accessoires
[/list]

3 new furniture sets have been added to this house: Armory (3000 gold), Forge (2500 Gold) and Housecarl\'s Room (500 Gold), all purchasable from [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Falk_Firebeard]Falk Firebeard[/url] in the Blue Palace.


[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
[list]
[b]Manual[/b]
[*]Extract the archive using [url=http://www.7-zip.org]7-zip[/url] or another archive utility
[*]Copy \"Royal Proudspire Manor.esp\" to your steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data folder
[*]Use the launcher or NMM to active the esp

[b]Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)[/b]
[*]Download and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/content/modmanager]NMM[/url]
[*]Download the mod using the green \"Download with manager\" button
[*]Activate the mod in NMM\'s \"Mods\" tab
[/list]


[size=5]UNINSTALLATION[/size]
[list]
[b]Manual[/b]
[*]Remove ALL your stuff from Proudspire Manor or it\'ll vanish
[*]Delete \"Royal Proudspire Manor.esp\" from your steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data folder

[b]NMM[/b]
[*]Deactivate the mod in the \"Mods\" tab
[*]Delete it using the red X button
[/list]
author: M3rvin
